title: Director Meet & Greet BBQ
description: Free glizzys, new friends, and good vibes! Meet BevSoc's Directors from Creative, HR, Events, Productions, Sponsorships & IT. Whether you want to get involved, learn about our portfolios, or just want to eat â€” we've got you covered.

title: O-Week 2026
description: BevSoc's FIRST-EVER O-Week appearance! Free drinks & tastings, stickers, silly straws, build-your-own keychains, food & drink vouchers, games, giveaways, mystery prizes, and guess-the-drink challenges. Sign up as a 2026 member for exclusive deals and discounted events!

title: Rewind Night
description: Turn back time with FABSOC, RapSoc, BevSoc, FoodLoversSoc & DigiSoc! A high-energy throwback social powered by techno, hyperpop, and summer-inspired chaos. Dress code: Straight out of 2016. 18+ event, valid ID required.

title: Build a Boba
description: Join us for a fun afternoon of building your own boba drinks!

title: Hallo-wasted
description: Spooky drinks and good vibes for Halloween!
